title: DEVELOPING A CEREAL STRAW BIOREFINERY USING RICE AS A MODEL AND A FEEDSTOCK
impactText: This is part of an on-going project being carried out in York, Dundee, Norwich and Hanoi and will take time for the outputs to mature Agriculture, Food and Drink,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology
findingsText: We have identified quantitative trait loci for biomass digestibility in rice. these need to be validated before they can be published or used in breeding, but this is a key first step. Effective protocols for straw saccharification are being established at IFR Once validated, the QTL can prove a valuable resource for improving rice straw for biofuels and animal feed applications Agriculture, Food and Drink,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology
